author: franzoni
body:
- for the unscheduled fundamenals, this PR gets the two commits from #10403 , thaks @davidlange6 
- for the unscheduled relval part, this PR inherits from #10440 (merged in 74x)
- full simr run2   and   realdata workflows are unscheduled 
  (except cosmics; not fast sim)
- new real data workflows added for 2015
- tools to select RAW data input based on lumi-section; factorization away from relval_steps into MatrixUtil
- 2015 golded json added and used to filter 2015B relval input
title: unscheduled + 2015B relvals
